text: The Doll Queen (German: Die Puppenkönigin) is a 1925 German silent comedy film directed by Gennaro Righelli and starring Maria Jacobini, Harry Liedtke, Viggo Larsen.Bock & Bergfelder p.285 The film's sets were designed by the art director István Szirontai Lhotka. ==Cast== * Maria Jacobini as Jeannine Armelle * Harry Liedtke as Comte Claude du Plessis * Viggo Larsen * Margarete Kupfer * Hans Wassmann * Erra Bognar * Hugo Döblin * Ida Wüst ==References== ==Bibliography== *Hans-Michael Bock and Tim Bergfelder. The Concise Cinegraph: An Encyclopedia of German Cinema. Berghahn Books, 2009. ==External links== * Category:1925 films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:Films directed by Gennaro Righelli Category:German silent feature films Category:1925 comedy films Category:German comedy films
title: The Doll Queen
